column10: This is such a dangerous intersection!!! This has been brought to the counties attention so many times.   We are playing with fire.  Elementary and middle school students use this unbelievably dangerous intersection every day without a crossing guard.

Very concerned about children crossing Patrick Henry Drive on their way to/from Cardinal Elementary. Distracted drivers are speeding down hill and have poor visibility since there’s a hill. It’s only a matter of time before someone gets hurt.
the street is narrow, car passed aggressively cutting into lead biker, car ignored the stop at the interstection
